queries.query:
import "math"

from(bucket: "nomad")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r.node_status == "ready" and
        r._field == "value" and
        r._measurement == "nomad.client.uptime" and
        r.node_class == "ingress-worker"
    )
    |> last()
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
    |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _value: math.floor(x: r._value / 86400.0)
    }))

import "math"

from(bucket: "nomad")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r.node_status == "ready" and
        r._field == "value" and
        r._measurement == "nomad.client.allocations.blocked" and
        r.node_class == "ingress-worker"
    )
    |> last()
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
    |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

import "join"
import "array"

nodes = from(bucket: "nomad")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "nomad.client.uptime"
    )
    |> last()
    |> group()
    |> keep(columns: ["host", "node_class"])

realData = from(bucket: "nomad")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._field == "count" and
        r._measurement == "nomad.client.allocs.oom_killed"
    )
    |> last()
    |> group()
    |> keep(columns: ["_value", "host"])

dummyData = array.from(rows: [{_value: 0, host: ""}])

join.left(
    left: union(tables: [realData, dummyData]),
    right: nodes,
    on: (l, r) => l.host == r.host,
    as: (l, r) => ({
        l with node_class: r.node_class
    })
)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        not exists r.node_class or
        r.node_class == "ingress-worker"
    )
    |> sum()

import "math"

    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r.node_status == "ready" and
        r._field == "value" and
        r._measurement == "nomad.client.uptime" and
        r.node_class == "main-worker"
    )
    |> last()
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
    |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _value: math.floor(x: r._value / 86400.0)
    }))

import "join"
import "array"

nodes = from(bucket: "nomad")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "nomad.client.uptime"
    )
    |> last()
    |> group()
    |> keep(columns: ["host", "node_class"])

realData = from(bucket: "nomad")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._field == "count" and
        r._measurement == "nomad.client.allocs.oom_killed"
    )
    |> last()
    |> group()
    |> keep(columns: ["_value", "host"])

dummyData = array.from(rows: [{_value: 0, host: ""}])

join.left(
    left: union(tables: [realData, dummyData]),
    right: nodes,
    on: (l, r) => l.host == r.host,
    as: (l, r) => ({
        l with node_class: r.node_class
    })
)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        not exists r.node_class or
        r.node_class == "main-worker"
    )
    |> sum()

from(bucket: "nomad")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r.node_status == "ready" and
        r._field == "value" and
        r._measurement == "nomad.client.unallocated.cpu" and
        r.node_class == "ingress-worker"
    )
    |> last()
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)

import "dict"

measurements = [
    "nomad.client.tasks.dead": "dead",
    "nomad.client.tasks.pending": "pending",
    "nomad.client.tasks.running": "running"
]

from(bucket: "nomad")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => 
        r.node_status == "ready" and
        r._field == "value" and
        (r._measurement == "nomad.client.tasks.running" or r._measurement == "nomad.client.tasks.pending" or r._measurement == "nomad.client.tasks.dead") and
        r.node_class == "ingress-worker"
    )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
    |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _measurement: dict.get(dict: measurements, key: r._measurement, default: r._measurement)
    }))

import "dict"

measurements = [
    "nomad.client.tasks.dead": "dead",
    "nomad.client.tasks.pending": "pending",
    "nomad.client.tasks.running": "running"
]

from(bucket: "nomad")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => 
        r.node_status == "ready" and
        r._field == "value" and
        (r._measurement == "nomad.client.tasks.running" or r._measurement == "nomad.client.tasks.pending" or r._measurement == "nomad.client.tasks.dead") and
        r.node_class == "main-worker"
    )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
    |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _measurement: dict.get(dict: measurements, key: r._measurement, default: r._measurement)
    }))

import "dict"
import "math"

measurements = [
    "nomad.client.host.cpu.total_percent": "cpu",
    "nomad.client.host.disk.inodes_percent": "inodes",
    "nomad.client.host.memory.used_percent": "memory",
    "nomad.client.host.disk.used_percent": "disk"
]

cpuPercentage = from(bucket: "nomad")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r.node_status == "ready" and
        r._field == "value" and
        r._measurement == "nomad.client.host.cpu.total_percent" and
        r.node_class == "ingress-worker"
    )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
    |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "node_class", "_measurement"])
    |> group(columns: ["node_class", "_time", "_measurement"])
    |> median(column: "_value")
    |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _value: math.round(x: r._value * 100.0) / 100.0
    }))

memoryPercentage = from(bucket: "nomad")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r.node_status == "ready" and
        r._field == "value" and
        (r._measurement == "nomad.client.host.memory.used" or r._measurement == "nomad.client.host.memory.total") and
        r.node_class == "ingress-worker"
    )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_measurement", "nomad.client.host.memory.used", "nomad.client.host.memory.total"])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _measurement: "nomad.client.host.memory.used_percent",
        _value: math.round(x: r["nomad.client.host.memory.used"] * 100.0 / r["nomad.client.host.memory.total"] * 100.0) / 100.0
    }))
    |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_measurement", "_value"])

diskPercentage = from(bucket: "nomad")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r.node_status == "ready" and
        r._field == "value" and
        (r._measurement == "nomad.client.host.disk.used_percent" or r._measurement == "nomad.client.host.disk.inodes_percent") and
        r.node_class == "ingress-worker"
    )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
    |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "node_class", "_measurement"])
    |> group(columns: ["node_class", "_time", "_measurement"])
    |> max(column: "_value")
    |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _value: math.round(x: r._value * 100.0) / 100.0
    }))

union(tables: [cpuPercentage, memoryPercentage, diskPercentage])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _measurement: dict.get(dict: measurements, key: r._measurement, default: r._measurement)
    }))
